#include <stdio.h>
 
inline int input( )
{
	    int n=0;
			    int ch=getchar_unlocked();
					    while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
								    n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getchar_unlocked();
							    return n;
}
 
int main ()
{
	int tc;
	tc = input();//	scanf("%d",&tc);
	while (tc--)
	{
		int n;
		n = input();//		scanf("%lld",&n);
 
		if(n&(n-1))
			printf("Yes\n");
		else
			printf("No\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
